content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.calender WITH  (
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi,  
    LOCATION = 'SILVER/calender',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS 
SELECT *
  FROM BRONZE.calendar;



  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.trip_type WITH  (
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi,  
    LOCATION = 'SILVER/trip_type',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS 
SELECT *
  FROM BRONZE.trip_type;


  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.vendor WITH  (
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi,  
    LOCATION = 'SILVER/vendor',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS 
SELECT *
  FROM BRONZE.vendor;
